overview: An Ulster Volunteer Force vigilante, turned police informer, is  sent by the British government to New Zealand to start a new  life, leaving behind his eldest son. Although his wife and two  young boys are also in New Zealand, they are no longer together,  and he has a new love interest. After some eight years his past  catches up with him when former comrades show up, intent on  extracting revenge. After two nearly successful attempts by them  (in Dunedin), the action moves to a final confrontation and  shootout in the hills above Queenstown.
tagline: Violence and death was his way of life...now it's his turn to pay the Price
title: The Grasscutter
